thread.title: BRIEF-Perry Ellis International Reports Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $2.56

title: BRIEF-Perry Ellis International Reports Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $2.56
text: 29 AM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Perry Ellis International Reports Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $2.56 Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Perry Ellis International Inc: * PERRY ELLIS INTERNATIONAL REPORTS STRONG FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2018 RESULTS * SEES FY 2019 REVENUE $855 MILLION TO $865 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE $227 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $227.2 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.88 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.80 TO $1.90 EXCLUDING ITEMS * ‍INVENTORY TURNED AT APPROXIMATELY 3.8X FOR FISCAL 2018​
